bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with gu leng 痼冷 , obstinacy-illness cold. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 5 Recipe Entry si shen dan 四神丹 , elixir with four wondrous [ingredients] : 治一切沉寒痼冷 , “It cures all types of deep-seated cold , i.e. obstinacy-illness cold”.

② Pharmacological Quality of substances with a cold nature and a downward effect. Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry di yu 地榆：性沉寒，入下焦 , “Its nature is that of deep-seated cold ; it enters the lower burner”.
